divs: sighting detailsi was playing a video game on the computer and happen to look out the window(which had blinds over the window). i saw a a 3\4 size of moon white maybe blueish orb in the sky that first looked like a meteor but it left no trail. this took much surprise to me. i saw whatever short amount of time i had until it was gone. i was calm for a little while but soon i felt like i was about to have an anxiety attack. it move straight across the sky maybe a little bit of turning. it just flew away the next half second.
Summary: A 3/4 size of moon white maybe blueish orb in the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jacksonville
There were no other sightings in Jacksonville on or around March 12th 2011
